law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Faculty" means the Medical and Chirurgical Faculty in the State.
"Maternal child health committee" means the maternal child health committee of the Faculty that is a medical review committee, as defined under § 1-401 of the Health Occupations Article.
"Maternal death" means the death of a woman during pregnancy or within 1 year after the woman ceases to be pregnant.
